lessons.japanese: できるだけたくさん熟語を暗記しなさい。
lessons.indonesian: Learn as many idioms as possible by heart.

lessons.japanese: 今まで私たちは熟語をいくつ勉強しましたか。
lessons.indonesian: How many idioms have we studied so far?

lessons.japanese: 今までに私達は熟語をいくつぐらい習ったかしら。
lessons.indonesian: How many proverbs have we learned so far?

lessons.japanese: できるだけたくさん熟語を暗記しなさい。
lessons.indonesian: Learn as many idioms as possible by heart.

lessons.japanese: 今までに私達は熟語をいくつぐらい習ったかしら。
lessons.indonesian: How many proverbs have we learned so far?

lessons.japanese: 今まで私たちは熟語をいくつ勉強しましたか。
lessons.indonesian: How many idioms have we studied so far?

lessons.japanese: 四字熟語とは四文字の熟語のことです。
lessons.indonesian: A "yo-ji-juku-go" in Japanese is an idiom made from a compound of four characters.

lessons.japanese: 日本語は四字熟語って結構あるね。
lessons.indonesian: There are lots of four-character compound words in Japanese, huh?

lessons.japanese: 日本語は四字熟語って結構あるね。
lessons.indonesian: There are lots of four-character compound words in Japanese, huh?

lessons.japanese: 四字熟語とは四文字の熟語のことです。
lessons.indonesian: A "yo-ji-juku-go" in Japanese is an idiom made from a compound of four characters.
